title: Europe confronts industrial reckoning as fears of deindustrialisation intensify [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Union leaders, industry executives and EU officials warn that stalled investment, energy costs and geopolitical shifts risk hollowing out Europe’s industrial base without urgent, coordinated action
summary_public: Union leaders, industry executives and EU officials warn that stalled investment, energy costs and geopolitical shifts risk hollowing out Europe’s industrial base without urgent, coordinated action
